message: for a model, better to have a generic "relationships" N..N with a symbol for the type, or individual references (following, fan, attending)?
ie: XXX.following, XXX.attending as actual has_and_belongs_to_many, or a generic "relationships" class w/ a reference to the user and a symbol for :following, :attending, :fan?
did this using concerns, so you can now do show.make_a(@user,:attending) or show.is_related?(@user,:attending), etc.
